name: Smol Ame
description:
A smol demo for a smol game about smol Ame.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys. Click on the game if it's not responding.

Hold R to quick restart level. Hold ESC to exit level. In downloaded version, press F1 to toggle full screen.

This is a fan game. I'm not affiliated with Hololive.

It still needs a lot of work, but I wanted to release something in celebration of her hitting 1 million subscribers soon.

I did a browser build because I know people don't like downloading stuff, but I recommend the download version because it runs way better.

---

Based on Amelia Watson of Hololive

Smol Ame by Walfie

"Ansaldo A.1 Ballila WW1 fighter" (https://skfb.ly/6RN9M) by NETRUNNER_pl is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
